  • Method Details

    • getInterestPointByStablishment

      @GetMapping("/interestPoint/{interestPointID}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getInterestPointByStablishment(@PathVariable("stablishmentID") Long stablishmentID, @PathVariable("interestPointID") Long interestPointID)
      This method is used to get an interest point from a stablishment by its ID.
      Parameters:
      stablishmentID - This is the ID of the stablishment.
      interestPointID - This is the ID of the interest point to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      an interest point.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the stablishment does not exist or if the interest point does not exist.
      Exception - if there is an error in the server.

    • getInterestPointsByStablishment

      @GetMapping("/interestPoint/all") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getInterestPointsByStablishment(@PathVariable("stablishmentID") Long stablishmentID)
      This method is used to get all interest points from a stablishment.
      Parameters:
      stablishmentID - This is the ID of the stablishment.
      Returns:
      a list of all interest points from the stablishment.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the stablishment does not exist or if the stablishment does not have any interest points.
      Exception - if there is an error in the server.

    • getInterestPointByEventName

      @GetMapping("/event/{eventName}/{eventDate}/interestPoint/{interestPointID}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getInterestPointByEventName(@PathVariable("stablishmentID") Long stablishmentID, @PathVariable("eventName") String eventName, @PathVariable("eventDate") LocalDate eventDate, @PathVariable("interestPointID") Long interestPointID)
      This method is used to get an interest point from an event by its ID.
      Parameters:
      stablishmentID - This is the ID of the stablishment.
      eventName - This is the name of the event.
      eventDate - This is the date of the event.
      interestPointID - This is the ID of the interest point to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      an interest point.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the stablishment, event or interest point does not exist.
      Exception - if there is an error in the server.

    • getInterestPointsByEventName

      @GetMapping("/event/{eventName}/{eventDate}/interestPoint/all") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getInterestPointsByEventName(@PathVariable("stablishmentID") Long stablishmentID, @PathVariable("eventName") String eventName, @PathVariable("eventDate") LocalDate eventDate)
      This method is used to get all interest points from an event.
      Parameters:
      stablishmentID - This is the ID of the stablishment.
      eventName - This is the name of the event.
      eventDate - This is the date of the event.
      Returns:
      a list of all interest points from the event.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the stablishment or event does not exist or if the event does not have any interest points.
      Exception - if there is an error in the server.

    • addInterestPointToStab

      @PostMapping("/interestPoint/add") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> addInterestPointToStab(@PathVariable("stablishmentID") Long stablishmentID, @RequestBody interestPoint newInterestPoint, @RequestHeader("Authorization") String token)
      This method is used to add an interest point to a stablishment.
      Parameters:
      stablishmentID - This is the ID of the stablishment.
      newInterestPoint - This is the interest point to be added.

      The interestPointID can be null as its autogenerated

      token - This is the JWT token of the user.
      Returns:
      a message that indicates that the interest point was added successfully.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the stablishment does not exist.
      Exception - if there is an error in the server.
      Input Format:
      { "interestPointID": "Long", "description": "String", "xCoordinate": "float", "yCoordinate": "float" }

    • addInterestPointToEvent

      @PostMapping("/event/{eventName}/{eventDate}/interestPoint/add") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> addInterestPointToEvent(@PathVariable("stablishmentID") Long stablishmentID, @PathVariable("eventName") String eventName, @PathVariable("eventDate") LocalDate eventDate, @RequestBody interestPoint newInterestPoint, @RequestHeader("Authorization") String token)
      This method is used to add an interest point to an event.
      Parameters:
      stablishmentID - This is the ID of the stablishment.
      eventName - This is the name of the event.
      eventDate - This is the date of the event.
      newInterestPoint - This is the interest point to be added.

      The interestPointID can be null as its autogenerated

      token - This is the JWT token of the user.
      Returns:
      a message that indicates that the interest point was added successfully.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the stablishment or event does not exist.
      Exception - if there is an error in the server.
      Input Format:
      { "interestPointID": "Long", "description": "String", "xCoordinate": "float", "yCoordinate": "float" }

    • updateInterestPointFromStablishment

      @PutMapping("/interestPoint/update/{interestPointID}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> updateInterestPointFromStablishment(@PathVariable("stablishmentID") Long stablishmentID, @PathVariable("interestPointID") Long interestPointID, @RequestBody interestPoint targetInterestPoint, @RequestHeader("Authorization") String token)
      This method is used to update an interest point from a stablishment.
      Parameters:
      stablishmentID - This is the ID of the stablishment.
      interestPointID - This is the ID of the interest point to be updated.
      targetInterestPoint - This is the interest point to be updated.
      token - This is the JWT token of the user.
      Returns:
      a message that indicates that the interest point was updated successfully.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the stablishment or interest point does not exist.
      Exception - if there is an error in the server.
      Input Format:
      { "interestPointID": "Long", "description": "String", "xCoordinate": "float", "yCoordinate": "float" }

    • updateInterestPointFromEvent

      @PutMapping("/event/{eventName}/{eventDate}/interestPoint/update/{interestPointID}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> updateInterestPointFromEvent(@PathVariable("stablishmentID") Long stablishmentID, @PathVariable("eventName") String eventName, @PathVariable("eventDate") LocalDate eventDate, @PathVariable("interestPointID") Long interestPointID, @RequestBody interestPoint targetInterestPoint, @RequestHeader("Authorization") String token)
      This method is used to update an interest point from an event.
      Parameters:
      stablishmentID - This is the ID of the stablishment.
      eventName - This is the name of the event.
      eventDate - This is the date of the event.
      interestPointID - This is the ID of the interest point to be updated.
      targetInterestPoint - This is the interest point to be updated.
      token - This is the JWT token of the user.
      Returns:
      a message that indicates that the interest point was updated successfully.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the stablishment, event or interest point does not exist.
      Exception - if there is an error in the server.
      Input Format:
      { "description": "String", "xCoordinate": "float", "yCoordinate": "float" }

      @DeleteMapping("/interestPoint/delete/{interestPointID}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteInterestPointFromStablishment(@PathVariable("stablishmentID") Long stablishmentID, @PathVariable("interestPointID") Long interestPointID, @RequestHeader("Authorization") String token)

      stablishmentID - This is the ID of the stablishment.
      interestPointID - This is the ID of the interest point to be deleted.
      token - This is the JWT token of the user.
      Returns:
      a message that indicates that the interest point was deleted successfully.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the stablishment or interest point does not exist.
      Exception - if there is an error in the server.

    • deleteInterestPointFromEvent

      @DeleteMapping("/event/{eventName}/{eventDate}/interestPoint/delete/{interestPointID}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteInterestPointFromEvent(@PathVariable("stablishmentID") Long stablishmentID, @PathVariable("eventName") String eventName, @PathVariable("eventDate") LocalDate eventDate, @PathVariable("interestPointID") Long interestPointID, @RequestHeader("Authorization") String token)
      This method is used to delete an interest point from an event.
      Parameters:
      stablishmentID - This is the ID of the stablishment.
      eventName - This is the name of the event.
      eventDate - This is the date of the event.
      interestPointID - This is the ID of the interest point to be deleted.
      token - This is the JWT token of the user.
      Returns:
      a message that indicates that the interest point was deleted successfully.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the stablishment, event or interest point does not exist.
      Exception - if there is an error in the server.
